mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT acBookIdx, TO_CHAR(accountBookDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') accountBookDate, content, amount, categoryIdx, classIdx FROM accountBook WHERE memberIdx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY accountBookDate ASC )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accountBook(acBookIdx, accountBookDate, content, amount, categoryIdx, classIdx) VALUES (account_seq.NEXTVAL, #{accountBookDate}, #{content}, #{amount}, #{categoryIdx}, #{classIdx})
